body:
Welp, it's been a great 14 months here, I made so many friends and what-not, but i'll just cut to the chase.

I'm very bored of avicus. The competitive spark that was once here, seems absent. it just seems like an endless grind to infinity.

I'll still be playing minecraft, but you'll find me on badlion, OCN and Kohi (w0wOCNBetitwascauseugotdemoted)

Will I still be on TS? Of fucking course I will be.

Forums? Ye boy

Skype? Ye boyyy

In-game Somewhat. I wont be playing at all, but occaisonally I'll pop in every once in a while to play a match or 2, but I wont return fully til the winter update (Or spring cmon funky :c) comes out, considering I had access to docs about what IS coming in the next update, Im pretty damn excited to see how the next page of avicus will turn out.

Until then, I hope you all enjoy yourselves here, it truly is an amazing experience to be involved in this community, even if I may not be in-game much anymore.

Also, to the new and old staff members, Keep improving, because even if you think you're doing a good job, you should still have that feeling of "I need to improve" Even if you're doing excellent, theres always room for improvement.

Bye goys, til the next update is out, Ill see you in my future endeavors!

(rip 94 ingame days played)

(rip 94 ingame days played)
